Posts.EditableText:
You can also do a "First Time" script. When they enter the room the first time, it'll show it's full description, but when they leave and come back it can be a modified/shorter description. Hope that helps!

Anonynn.

Do add new script 
Select scripts (third one down )
Select call function ( eighth one down)
ShowRoomDescription.

Posts.EditableText:
Of course you could just add it to the action message
First time " As you pick up the coat, something falls out onto the floor "
Make visible key.
Otherwise " You pick up the coat.
